sourcesContent:
export const classes = [
  {
    className: "mage",
    hp: 100,
    atk: 16,
    int: 150,
    spd: 50,
    agi: 50,
    color: "#3FC7EB",
    icon: "mageIcon",
    potions: 2,
  },
  {
    className: "voleur",
    hp: 100,
    atk: 44,
    int: 20,
    spd: 80,
    agi: 60,
    color: "#FFF468",
    icon: "rogueIcon",
    potions: 2,
  },
  {
    className: "guerrier",
    hp: 100,
    atk: 130,
    int: 10,
    spd: 30,
    agi: 40,
    color: "#C69B6D",
    icon: "warriorIcon",
    potions: 2,
  },
];

export const mageClass = {
  className: "zombie",
  atk: 16,
  int: 150,
  spd: 50,
  agi: 50,
  color: "rgb(8, 158, 93)",
};

export const rogueClass = {
  className: "rogue",
  atk: 44,
  int: 20,
  spd: 80,
  agi: 60,
  color: "#FFF468",
};

export const warriorClass = {
  className: "warrior",
  atk: 130,
  int: 10,
  spd: 30,
  agi: 40,
  color: "#C69B6D",
};
